fields.name: Advocate Peace:
fields.value: If your target is attacked, you will be attacked instead. If your target attacks, you will be attacked instead and will counter-attack your target.

fields.name: Stage Protest (1x, Locked):
fields.value: Unlocked if you place in the top 3. Redirect one random attack tonight into yourself.

fields.name: Win Con:
fields.value: Survive an attack for 3/4 nights (rounded down but not less than 1) at game end; or win and exit the game if you survive an attack 4 nights in total.
